showScoreExcerpt:
"Sarah Snook wows in technical marvel"

Read more
bwwExcerpt: But what the worthwhile play offers — and I know there are many who pooh-pooh screens onstage as a rule — is the childlike wonderment of not understanding the logistics of what you’re looking at. The first hour is marked by awed and confused “How did they do that?”s. “How did she do that?”
